snippet: George Karl, 62, guided the Denver Nuggets to a franchise-record 57 wins, but they were eliminated from the playoffs in the first round for the fourth straight year.
abstract: Denver Nuggets part ways with George Karl, adding an unexpected jolt to an unusually hyperactive NBA coaching carousel; he is dismissed with a year left on his contract, and just 29 days after he was named coach of the year for leading the Nuggets to a 57-25 record, the franchise’s best mark since entering the NBA.
lead_paragraph: George Karl, 62, guided the Denver Nuggets to a franchise-record 57 wins, but they were eliminated from the playoffs in the first round for the fourth straight year.

headline.seo: George Karl Is Out as Coach of NuggetsGeorge Karl Is Out as Coach of the Nuggets
headline.main: Karl Is Out of a Job in Denver and Drawing Interest Elsewhere
headline.print_headline: Karl, Coach of the Year, Is Out of a Job in Denver
